prompts: Create a psychic-type Pokemon with a unique geometric shape and a mystical aura.
Imagine a small, ancient-looking Pokemon that resembles a toy with a magical glow.
Generate a Pokemon design inspired by ancient artifacts, featuring a swirling body and psychic powers.
Show me a Psychic Pokemon that looks like it's from an ancient civilization with a simple design.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of ancient relics, with a quirky and playful demeanor.
Design a creature with a round body and arms resembling a toy, evoking a sense of wonder.
Give me a Pokemon that combines elements of ancient toys with psychic abilities.
